description:
Temporary humanoid form, which appeared when Boota`s spiral energy resonated with http://anidb.net/ch1681 [Lorgenome`s].
Curiously, his "human form" appears in the prologue of the first episode. The glasses Boota has in his humanoid form are the same glasses Nono have in her http://anidb.net/ch9222 [Buster Machine No. 7 form] in the anime http://anidb.net/a2120 [Diebuster].
name: Boota (Ningen Gata)
